# Export crosstabs to txt file and push to synapse

```{r}
library(MSnbase)

load("data/msnset_phospho_siteID_uncorrected.RData")
exprs(m) <- signif(exprs(m), 3)
write.table(exprs(m), file="data/PTRC_Ex17_crosstabPhospho_SiteID_uncorrected.txt",
            quote=F, sep="\t")

load("data/msnset_phospho_siteID_corrected.RData")
exprs(m) <- signif(exprs(m), 3)
write.table(exprs(m), file="data/PTRC_Ex17_crosstabPhospho_SiteID_batchCorrected.txt",
            quote=F, sep="\t")

load("data/msnset_phospho_siteID_uncorrected_phospho_coefficients.RData")
exprs(m) <- signif(exprs(m), 3)
write.table(exprs(m), file="data/PTRC_Ex17_crosstabPhospho_SiteID_uncorrected_phosphoCoeffs.txt",
            quote=F, sep="\t")



#

load("data/msnset_phospho_peptide_uncorrected.RData")
exprs(m) <- signif(exprs(m), 3)
write.table(exprs(m), file="data/PTRC_Ex17_crosstabPhospho_peptide_uncorrected.txt",
            quote=F, sep="\t")

load("data/msnset_phospho_peptide_corrected.RData")
exprs(m) <- signif(exprs(m), 3)
write.table(exprs(m), file="data/PTRC_Ex17_crosstabPhospho_peptide_batchCorrected.txt",
            quote=F, sep="\t")

load("data/msnset_phospho_peptide_uncorrected_phospho_coefficients.RData")
exprs(m) <- signif(exprs(m), 3)
write.table(exprs(m), file="data/PTRC_Ex17_crosstabPhospho_peptide_uncorrected_phosphoCoeffs.txt",
            quote=F, sep="\t")
```
